des:
We strive to make home smarter and more convenient. 
NG is now part of Alexa Connected Home. You can now voice control your aroma diffusers, just simply say: 
"Alexa, turn on my diffuser"
"Alexa, turn off my diffuser"

You can also ask Alexa to set the color of your Aroma Diffuser by saying: 
"Alexa, set my diffuser to yellow"
"Alexa, set my diffuser to purple"

To get started:
1, You'll need a NG Aroma Diffuser.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our NG APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or Apple Store. 
After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
